commit message:
Merge pull request #198 from gebner/master

Remove length restrictions on passwords
comments: menu: hide OP Edit and Delete until safely determined to show

launcher icon: change to full body alien; add xhdpi and ldpi

also change drawable-small to drawable-ldpi which is more
appropriate and follows android guidelines
http://developer.android.com/guide/practices/screens_support.html

inbox: check mail by looking at /api/me.json first; avoid SSL

if you hit /message/inbox.json directly, it redirects to login
if you are not logged in. this is a burden on reddit servers.
/api/me.json is better to check first.
use the /user/foo/about.json api for karma; rename package .me to .user

fix UserInfo to accept null values when looking at other profiles

also complete the implementation of Parcelable for UserInfo

add 5 minute minimum interval between mail checks

also only use PeekEnvelopeTask in places where user is
thought to be logged in
proguard.cfg: add UserInfo and UserListing for Jackson
